titleStmt.title: Lorenzo Thomas, Special Orders No. 86, Order
CWG8361

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
War Department
Adjutant Generals Office
Washington April 19th 1862
4. The following officers having been reported on adversely by Board of Examination. and the President having approved the reports are discharged the Service to take effect April 14th 1862.

By Order of Secretary of War
Signed L. Thomas
Adjutant General

Headquarter Dep of the Miss
St Louis April 25th 1862
Official. J. Kelton
Asst Adjt General (over)

Hon: Nat Gaither Jr
Sec: of State-
I enclose copy of extract from War Department, that you may make the necessary entries on your Books-

Resply
John W. Finnell
Adjt Genl

Adjt Genls Office
Frankfort Ky:
28 April 1862
